info.description:
You want a purple-dark Youtube? This theme is for you!
It makes your Youtube all purple!
In additionaly, you can have the Premium Logo.
Please change youtube white theme to black, so you will be able to see better the text.
Can't change "immersive view" color to purple, u can use "theater mode" to hide it :)
Enjoy!
